title: Textile, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal
Technique: appliqué and couching on velvet
description: Green panel of green velvet applique and olive green couching in formal curving vine design on a green background. Border of green velvet, trimmed with gold fringe. Lined in green silk.
